content: Flint Chief is a Yaoguai Chief you'll fight near the start of the Furnace Valley section of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This optional boss is easily missable but can be found tucked away in a lava stream as you head up to Rakshasha Palace.
promot:
This excerpt is taken from the file "Flint_Chief.md", under the primary heading "Flint Chief". The content is presented below:

Flint Chief is a Yaoguai Chief you'll fight near the start of the Furnace Valley section of Chapter 5 in Black Myth: Wukong. This optional boss is easily missable but can be found tucked away in a lava stream as you head up to Rakshasha Palace.
